评论详情: She says it's comfortable, nice and long, has a nice hood, and it's super cute and high quality. I'm a man and o f course would also wear it, she needed a nicer robe, this delivered
I walk the dogs at night with the temperatures in the 20's & 30's. This robe is very comfortable & warm.
Really thick and soft! Wonderful feeling!
Plush, warm and stylish.  Husband loves it.
Great quality. Soft and fluffy. Awesome for star trek fans!

Now not only do I believe I’m Captain Kirk. I’m also dressing in his attire. Fits great. Very cosy. Keeps my neighbours wondering when I enjoy my coffee on my front deck (which I refer to as the observation deck).
Prodotto conforme a descrizione e foto, qualità, prezzo al Top Venditore gentile e disponibile
Alright item but the cord was missing.

Lovely comfortable dressing gown, lovely bright colour and design. Fits well, feels soft and warm. Ordered as a Father’s Day gift. Was delivered on time and packaged well. Recipient was happy with it.
My husband was over the moon with his Kirk dressing gown. Lovely quality too.
Si vous voulez surprendre votre factrice ;-)
Brought this for my trekkie fan dad. He loves it. It's very warm and cosy especially with the hood up. Great sizing too.
It's nice and all but I expected it to come with a belt as per the image!
Is pretty, soft and warm, good to use as a robe, but totally water repellent and not suitable as a bathrobe. It doesn’t dry you :/

Bought as a gift for my grandad who loves Star Trek. Of course the brand name bulks up the price but anyone would still except a clean dressing gown to arrive. Luckily I opened it prior and have had to brush off all the fluff/debris (hard red bits) and there’s a small stain next to the pocket.  Please check your stock before packaging.  Would of given high stars if there wasn’t the small stain and the effort of having to lint roll it as the dressing gown itself is soft and good quality
Bought for the fathering in law .. he loved it and said it was warm . Would recommend

Covered in loads of fluff! Poor stitching & overall poor quality for the price. Thank god I opened it and lint rolled it as it was a Christmas present and I’d have been embarrassed on the day. Honestly seen better for an under £10 dressing gown. Shocking!
